law.text: The provisions of KRS 278.2201 to 278.2213 and KRS 278.2215 and 278.2219 shall not apply to telecommunications utilities, telecommunications services, nonprofit water or sewer utilities, or water districts.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 511, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000.
